This is a blog project that reads Markdown files and converts them to HTML using Hugo ðŸ”¥

Benefits

Hosting cost

Using this approach I am able to minimize hosting costs as far as possible, since only HTML files are served and I don’t require a database.

Theming

Hugo enables theming and many skilled designers have published their cool themes which can easily be imported and used. So, no more centering divs myself :)

Can I help?

Yes, you can. If you are familiar with Hugo and spot a flaw in my config files or just have a better approach, pls contact me via the contact section at my portfolio site eliaskelta.com!
